class.name: OpenXRSpatialCapabilityConfigurationMicroQrCode
class.brief_description: Configuration header for QR code markers.
class.description: Configuration header for QR code markers. Pass this to [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.create_spatial_context] to create a spatial context that can detect QR code markers.

method.name: get_enabled_components
method.description: Returns the components enabled by this configuration. [b]Note:[/b] Only valid after this configuration was used to create a spatial context.
